wikipedia_page.main: Antony Paul Gallacher (born 23 July 1999) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays for St Johnstone as a left back. He has previously played for Falkirk, Liverpool and Toronto FC.

response: He is the son of Jim Gallacher, a goalkeeper who played in the Scottish Football League for 22 years, and the cousin of full-back Tony Gallacher, who was previously on the books of Liverpool.

His son, Paul Gallacher, also became a professional football goalkeeper,https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/paul-gallacher-looks-to-go-one-or-two-better-than-his-dad-vswtxs0rqb8 playing for Dundee United, Norwich City and Scotland, while his nephew Tony Gallacher was previously on the books of Liverpool.
* Jim Gallacher, Paul Gallacher (son), Tony Gallacher (nephew)
